nodes.name: MakerV2Manager
addInvestment
removeInvestment
getInvestment
joinDsr
exitDsr
swapSaiToDai

MakerV2Manager

devdoc.author: Olivier VDB - <olivier@argent.xyz>
devdoc.details: Module to convert SAI <-> DAI and lock/unlock MCD DAI into/from Maker's Pot,

addInvestment(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Invest tokens for a given period.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to invest.
params._period: The period over which the tokens may be locked in the investment (optional).

addInvestment(address,address,uint256,ui.return: The exact amount of tokens that have been invested.

addModule(address,address).details: Adds a module to a wallet. First checks that the module is registered. Unlike its overrided parent, this method can be called via the RelayerModule's execute()

params._data: The data for the relayed transaction
params._gasLimit: The gas limit to use for the gas refund.
params._gasPrice: The gas price to use for the gas refund.
params._nonce: The nonce used to prevent replay attacks.
params._signatures: The signatures as a concatenated byte array.

exitDsr(address,uint256).details: lets the owner withdraw MCD DAI from the DSR Pot.

params._amount: The amount of DAI to withdraw

getInvestment(address,address).details: Get the amount of investment in a given token.
getInvestment(address,address).return: The value in tokens of the investment (including interests) and the time at which the investment can be removed.

getNonce(address).details: Gets the current nonce for a wallet.

init(address).details: Inits the module for a wallet by logging an event. The method can only be called by the wallet itself.

isOnlyOwnerModule().details: Returns a constant that indicates that the module is an OnlyOwnerModule.

joinDsr(address,uint256).details: lets the owner deposit MCD DAI into the DSR Pot.

params._amount: The amount of DAI to deposit

recoverToken(address).details: Utility method enbaling anyone to recover ERC20 token sent to the module by mistake and transfer them to the Module Registry.

params._fraction: The fraction of invested tokens to exit in per 10000.

swapDaiToSai(address,uint256).details: lets the owner convert MCD DAI into SCD SAI.

params._amount: The amount of DAI to convert

swapSaiToDai(address,uint256).details: lets the owner convert SCD SAI into MCD DAI.

params._amount: The amount of SAI to convert

devdoc.title: MakerV2Manager
